verbose_text: Wipfler et al. recently measured the transcription of GD3 synthase ST8SIA1, the putative sialic acid specific O-acetyltransferase CASD1, the human sialidases NEU1 and NEU3, and the sialic acid O-esterase SIAE in various human lymphocyte subsets representing various differentiation and activation stages in comparison to the expression of GD3 and its 7-O-acetylated and 9-O-acetylated variants (CD60a, b, c) [XREF_BIBR].
